skdetail:

Invocation Name: relaxing sleep
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Relaxing Sleep is the Alexa skill that offers guided sessions to help you unwind and drift effortlessly into a state of deep relaxation. With over 10 unique sessions, each lasting 10 minutes, and a variety of soothing voices combined with calming background sounds, this skill is designed to prepare your body and mind for restful, restorative sleep.

⭐ PREMIUM FEATURES⭐

• Guided sessions with professional, calming voices
• A selection of background sounds tailored for deep relaxation
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Regularly updated programs to enhance your sleep experience
• Full access to all session lengths

We value your feedback to help us improve and provide the ultimate relaxation and sleep experience.

Enjoy your journey to peaceful and relaxing sleep!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
